# getBlockNumber() function

Get the latest block number from a given network.

## Example

```javascript
const block = await getBlockNumber({
  network: "ethereum",
});
```

**Signature:**

```typescript
export declare function getBlockNumber(
  params: GetBlockNumberParams,
): Promise<number>;
```

## Parameters

| Parameter | Type                                                  | Description |
| --------- | ----------------------------------------------------- | ----------- |
| params    | [GetBlockNumberParams](./sdk.getblocknumberparams.md) |             |

**Returns:**

Promise&lt;number&gt;

the latest block number
